overview: Melodie seems like your regular ALT-GIRL next door... but her happy-go-lucky video game playing day takes a turn when she is chosen for a mysterious corporate mission. To accomplish it she must face and fight her way through levels of bizarre sexual perversion... could it be real? ALT-GIRL today... ALT-HERO tomorrow!
tagline: A Sexy Hero Trapped In A Game Of Perversion!
title: Man's Ruin
